price: Na εnnyε sεdeε mopε, na mmom sεdeε Onyankopͻn, Abͻdeε nyinaa Wura no pε (na εbεyε hͻ).
arabic: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wamā tashāūna illā an yashāa al-lahu rabbu al-ʿālamīna
